text: 18:16 Godɨn Araziba 19:15; Jon 8:17; 2 Korin 13:1; 1 Timoti 5:19Egh a nɨ baraghan aghuaghtɨ, nɨ gumazitam uam, o igharazir pumuning uam me inightɨ, me nɨn gɨn mangɨ. E fo, Godɨn Akɨnafarim kamaghɨn mɨgei, ‘Nɨ gumazitamɨn arazir kuram an gun a mɨkɨmsɨ, gumazir pumuning ko mɨkezim gavgavim nɨn mɨgɨrɨgɨabar anɨngam.’
